task.title: Remove Roles from Users
task.shortdesc: Removed roles from selected user on the User Roles page. One or more roles can be deleted at a time.

step.cmd: From the Users Summary page, select a user's Full Name link. The User Summary page appears.
Select the User Roles tab. The User Roles page appears.
Check the Delete box of the applicable role or roles to delete.
Click the Delete icon. A confirmation message appears.
Click OK. The User Roles page appears without the selected role(s).

note.p: When attempting to remove all roles from a user, an error message appears, preventing the deletion. UltiPro requires that each user must be assigned at least one role.
